attacks.name: Intense Glare
attacks.effect: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch. The new Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Ninetales ex.
